website_summaries.verdict: With it's easily upgradeable design, this high-performing PC is built to last.
pros: Tower boots up faster than the average PC
The tower is quite large, but still has a simple, sleek design
New games, and demanding programs such as Photoshop run seamlessly on this device
There are 8 USB slots in total
Multiple memory slots make adding more memory easy
You can put up to 32GB of RAM
With the removal of just one screw, you have access to the inside of the case
cons: There was some bloatware on the PC, but it was easy enough to uninstall

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I like the speed
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I like the speed, a major upgrade for our family. None of the USB ports are 2.0 I can't use a USB to any entry level printer I've seen so far - I'm not really skilled enough to try and deal with the issue so I've gone wireless - don't love that option as it's shaky and if it goes wrong I'm the only one in the house who can fix it. So far that is the only issue I've had.
customer_reviews.author: William Crawford

customer_reviews.title: It was so easy to set up and get running
customer_reviews.text: This Pc is a home run , It was so easy to set up and get running. It's so quite,....You don't even no it's running, I've got to put my ear to it at times, then I can here the fans running. It handles all of my gaming needs, And my 9 security cameras with out the CPU % going over 15-18 %, It will basically handle "Any Thing" I got to throw at it,....And More.
customer_reviews.author: G&S

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I overplayed a bit for this computer
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I overplayed a bit for this computer. 24 GB of ram is also not needed for most tasks these days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazian Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fast! After 8 years putting up with an ...
customer_reviews.text: Very fast! After 8 years putting up with an iMac, I look forward to this tower's flexibility and upgradeability. But I don't foresee needing to upgrade any time soon. This pc is powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Kachemak

customer_reviews.title: Very good for gaming and work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer for gaming. Playing FO3, FO4 and the Witcher 3 with no problems. Superfast, and as a bonus, doubles as a great work computer.
customer_reviews.author: GTinLA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful desktop. Very fast and with lot of usb connections.
customer_reviews.author: Kasi

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Silent -- Great Multi-tasking
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for about a year now.. Incredibly fast and quiet. I can multi-task with resource heavy photo and video editing software. Only thing I would have done differently is get the upgraded SSD C Drive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: Fast & easy. Replaced my I7-960 and is noticeably faster. Super quiet and cool. Great video (I'm using 2 each 28" Asus monitors). Goes from off to ready to use in about a minute with a ton of software loaded. Thoughtful collection of ports. Not much junk software preloaded. WiFi + Bluetooth. Good video - I Photoshop & it's fast enough - scrolls 50k hi-res Lightroom pics with no delay.
customer_reviews.author: JustDave1

customer_reviews.title: Needs restore disk
customer_reviews.text: I like the computer but I am disappointed that he did not come with restore disk and it does not have a DVD burner or CD-ROM burner I wish I could get the restore disk
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Product was just what i wanted and it arrived in a timely manner, Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very fast computer, works perfectly with windows 10 I haven't had any issues so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Installation
customer_reviews.text: Upgrading from my eight year old Dell with Windows 7 was more than necessary and the new Dell XPS x8900-7319 is fully meeting my needs. Moving to the new computer went smoothly (partly thanks to my husband's help). The boot up is seconds compared to the minutes with the old computer. There is still software to be loaded but the computer was up and running in a very short time. The sleek, shorter tower fits nicely under my desk.
customer_reviews.author: CorlissMN

customer_reviews.title: So pretty much I can't use the internet
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars if not for the fact that the PC will not stay connected to my wifi, and my modem is to far to plug into. I have tried many troubleshooting fixes and nothing has worked. So pretty much I can't use the internet. Aside from that it works well. Hoping its just a windows 10 issue.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Pleased Buyer
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic unit for the price.Fast start up & handles all my programs well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Keehan

customer_reviews.title: crap..
customer_reviews.text: crap... i should have listened to the other reviews / took a chance. it came with NO ssd....supposed to have 2tb of ssd... on the phone with Dell... telling me to contact amazon... tells me to contact Dell
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: I bought Dell XPS brand new computer its did not perform good after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Dell Computer ,I believe did not have any quality at all. I bought Dell XPS brand new computer its did not perform good after 2 years. i call Dell support the support team ask me to pay for service. Don't be fool by the name, These brand name computer is only work good for first 2 years. Think twice before you spend a lot of money in the long run for repair it.
customer_reviews.author: ben

product_meta.title: Dell XPS x8900-7319BLK Tower Desktop (Intel Core i7-6700K 4GHz Processor, NVIDIA Gaming GTX 960, 24 GB RAM, 2 TB HDD + 256 GB SDD, Windows 10 Pro) Black
product_meta.description: Fully loaded. With room for more. Everything you'd expect from an XPS desktop, now more powerful than ever. Enjoy blazing fast speed with next generation processors and graphics plus huge expandability potential. A machine built to keep up with you.
feature_bullets: Fast performance with 8GB DDR4 (2133Mhz) memory and 1TB (7,200RPM) storage
Astounding visuals with NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB DDR5 graphics; 802.11 AC with Bluetooth 4.0 for faster web browsing
Windows 10 Professional OS (64bit), Dell KB216 wired keyboard and mouse
Intel Core i7-6700K, up to 4 GHz Processor with NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB GDDR5

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars28 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
